title: The Peysoh Interview: Seeing His Father Murdered at 6, Being On The Run, Pill Addiction & More
description:
Peysoh recently sat down with Adam for this interview just a few days before getting arrested in LA. Peysoh talks about his rough upbringing, seeing things no kids should see, trying to make a life for himself with music and more.
